Posts.Content: Don't worry about having a mammogram. When it's done right there is only mild discomfort. I've had at least 10. Only one was painful but that was the technicians fault. Quote: Originally Posted by crabbycdn How do you know? One specialist says breast, the other says lymph. The lump is not painful unless you poke at it. I was not even aware it was there until the doctor started to squeeze and poke around. I will be getting a mammogram. Do they just squeeze your boobs or does this includge under the arm. Never had a mammogram before. I hear it is like somebody stepping on your boobs with big steel boots.
Posts.Title: Armpit lump - breast or lymph
